Export.Routine: INARTK12 ;INARTK52;DT;WÃ„HRUNG DES LIEFERANTEN;21.06.2001 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| If supplier is foreign currency disable the entry of Base Currency price. (SR12008) ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| DT 21.06.2001 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; QUIT:$PIECE(YKEY,",",2)="" NEW WHR,LIEF SET LIEF=$PIECE(YKEY,",",2) SET WHR=$PIECE($GET(^INLIEF(YM,LIEF,1)),Y,51) IF (WHR'="")&&(WHR'=YWHR) set YHID=2 QUIT
